Name: Luxor Evolved
About the game: In an all-new, completely revamped LUXOR Evolved, the chains are faster, the power-ups more awesome, the shooters more stealthy. In this retro-styled arcade shooter, you’ll experience a faster, more intense LUXOR, unlike any you’ve seen before. Revisiting the arcade classics, LUXOR Evolved is action packed with 65 unique levels, addicting effects and sound tracks. This number one marble shooter game has tons to keep the challenges coming and your shooter firing. Key Features: 65 levels of all-new fast and furious LUXOR 7 Interactive Sound Tracks 21 power-ups and 3 super power-ups that upgrade your Shooter 4 Game modes Unlockable secret levels and bonus levels 33 Achievements
